Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Lawndale/31st
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th near Lawndale/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th: due to street blockage near Lawndale/31st.

Southbound buses will operate via Central, 31st and Lawndale.

Northbound buses will operate via Central Park and 25th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/66th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Marquette, Morgan, 63rd, and resume on Halsted due to street blockage near Halsted/66th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Marquette, Morgan, 63rd, and resume on Halsted due to street blockage near Halsted/66th.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Sedgwick
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Sedgwick due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Sedgwick due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
